text: our breaking news we've received a
statement from the rezidor hotel group
which owns and operates the Radisson Blu
Hotel in Bamako in Mali and it says it
is aware of a hostage-taking ongoing at
the property today adding that according
to its information to people have locked
in 140 guests and 30 employees so that's
just coming from the hotel and if I can
flesh that out for you we have heard via
BBC monitoring quoting the depeche do
madam Ollie news website as saying that
one person has been killed several
others injured in this attack the
website also suggested 10 gunmen may be
involved in that attack that has yet to
be verified but there are French troops
patrolling in the area as well
